participant_1.background: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i'm four years old.

participant_2.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

content.text: Wanna come to me? I bought a new grill?
